name: Click Data Defense
description:
The game is an infinite clicker tower defense game.  Assets are taken from Data Defense.

Click to shoot the nearest enemy. 
Click & Hold to charge an AoE attack.

Kill enemies to gain credits.
Spend credits to improve Click dmg (button on the left) or to Build / Upgrade towers. 

Controls:
1, 2, 3, 4 are hotkeys for the towers
Esc opens the option's menu
S and U will sell or upgrade a selected tower 

(selling gives no refund but reduces price of the next tower of that type your build)

If the base takes 3 hits, it restarts the waves.

Push it as far as you can!!
